--- id: war-griffons-titan-legion title: Adeptus Mechanicus – Titan Legion name: War Griffons Titan Legion introduction: | intro forces: - adeptus-mechanicus-titan-legion - imperial-navy using_the_army_list: | The following army list allows you to field an army based on one of the War Griffons Titan Legion. It can also be used as a stand in army list for other Titan Legions as well. War Griffons Titan Legion formations come in three types: battle titans, scout titans and support formations. Each battle titan you include in the army allows you to field any two scout titan formations. Each battle titan or scout titan formation allows you to field any one support formation. Although you can only take a scout titan or support formation if you first take a battle titan formation, they are treated as separate independent formations during a battle and do not have to move around together. In addition, certain formations may be given upgrades. Which upgrades a formation may be given are listed in the upgrades column. Upgrades are added to the formation and are not a separate formation. Each upgrade that is taken adds to the cost of the formation, as shown on the upgrade chart. **Note:** the upgrades chosen can lead to an additional surcharge (see [War Griffons Epic Tournament Special Rules](#war-griffons-epic-tournament-special-rules)). special_rules: - god-machines - war-griffons-epic-tournament-special-rules ---

War Griffons Titan Legion armies have a strategy rating of 3. Battle and Scout Titan formations have an initiative rating of 1+. All other formations have an initiative rating of 2+.

Battle Titan Formations
Formation Units Upgrades Cost
Emperor One Imperator or Warmonger Class Titan Carapace Multilasers, Legate, Sacred Icon, Veteran Princeps 1250 points
Reaver One Reaver Class Titan All 575 points
Warlord One Warlord Class Titan All 725 points
Scout Titan Formations
(Any two scout titan formations may be fielded per each battle titan.)
Formation Units Upgrades Cost
Warhound One Warhound Class Titan Inferno Gun, Plasma Blastgun, Turbo-Laser Destructor, Veteran Princeps, Vulcan Mega-Bolter 275 points
Warhound Pack Two Warhound Class Titans Inferno Gun, Plasma Blastgun, Turbo-Laser Destructor, Veteran Princeps, Vulcan Mega-Bolter 500 points
Titan Upgrades
(Upgrades may be taken once per formation.)
Upgrade Units Cost
Apocalypse Missile Launcher Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with an Apocalypse Missile Launcher +25 points each
Carapace Landing Pad Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Carapace Landing Pad Free
Carapace Multilasers Add one Carapace Multilasers character to a unit in the formation +50 points
Close Combat Weapon Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Close Combat Weapon Free
Corvus Assault Pod Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Corvus Assault Pod Free
Gatling Blaster Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Gatling Blaster +25 points each
Inferno Gun Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with an Inferno Gun Free
Laser Blaster Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Laser Blaster +50 points each
Laser Burner Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Laser Burner Free
0–1 Legate Add one Legate character per army to a unit in the formation +50 points
Melta Cannon Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Melta Cannon +50 points each
Plasma Blastgun Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Plasma Blastgun Free
Plasma Cannon Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Plasma Cannon +25 points each
Plasma Destructor Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Plasma Destructor +75 points each
Quake Cannon Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Quake Cannon +75 points each
Sacred Icon Add one Sacred Icon character to a unit in the formation +50 points
Support Missile Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Support Missile +75 points each
Turbo-Laser Destructor Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Turbo-Laser Destructor +25 points each
Veteran Princeps Add one Veteran Princeps character to a unit in the formation +25 points
Volcano Cannon Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Volcano Cannon +50 points each
Vulcan Mega-Bolter Mount any number of Weapon Mounts in the formation with a Vulcan Mega-Bolter Free
Support Formations
(Any one support formation may be fielded per each battle or scout titan formation.)
Formation Units Cost
Forge Knight Maniple Five Forge Knights 250 points
0–1 Lysander Fighter per Warmonger Class Titan One Lysander Fighter 75 points
Marauder Squadron Two Marauder Bombers 250 points
0–1 Orbital Support One Ark Mechanicus Battleship 200 points
Recon Cohort Four Sentinels 100 points
0–1 Skitarii Demi-Century per Corvus Assault Pod Eight Hypaspist units and two Secutor units 200 points
Thunderbolt Squadron Two Thunderbolt Fighters 150 points
